001package squidpony.squidai;
002
003import squidpony.squidgrid.FOV;
004import squidpony.squidgrid.Measurement;
005import squidpony.squidgrid.Radius;
006import squidpony.squidgrid.mapping.DungeonUtility;
007import squidpony.squidmath.Coord;
008import squidpony.squidmath.NumberTools;
009import squidpony.squidmath.OrderedMap;
010import squidpony.squidmath.OrderedSet;
011
012import java.io.Serializable;
013import java.util.ArrayList;
014import java.util.Arrays;
015import java.util.Collection;
016
017/**
018 * An AOE type that has an origin, a radius, an angle, and a span; it will blast from the origin to a length equal to
019 * radius along the angle (in degrees), moving somewhat around corners/obstacles, and also spread a total of span
020 * degrees around the angle (a span of 90 will affect a full quadrant, centered on angle). You can specify the
021 * RadiusType to Radius.DIAMOND for Manhattan distance, RADIUS.SQUARE for Chebyshev, or RADIUS.CIRCLE for Euclidean.
022 *
023 * RADIUS.CIRCLE (Euclidean measurement) will produce the most real-looking cones. This will produce doubles for its
024 * {@link #findArea()} method which are greater than 0.0 and less than or equal to 1.0.
025 *
026 * This class uses {@link FOV} to create its area of effect.
027 * Created by Tommy Ettinger on 7/13/2015.
028 */
029public class ConeAOE implements AOE, Serializable {
030    private static final long serialVersionUID = 2L;
031    private FOV fov;
032    private Coord origin;
033    private double radius, angle, span;
034    private double[][] map;
035    private char[][] dungeon;
036    private Radius radiusType;
037    private Reach reach = new Reach(1, 1, Radius.SQUARE, AimLimit.FREE);
038
039    public ConeAOE(Coord origin, Coord endCenter, double span, Radius radiusType)
040    {
041        fov = new FOV(FOV.RIPPLE_LOOSE);
042        this.origin = origin;
043        radius = radiusType.radius(origin.x, origin.y, endCenter.x, endCenter.y);
044
045        angle = NumberTools.atan2_(endCenter.y - origin.y, endCenter.x - origin.x) * 360.0;
046//        this.startAngle = Math.abs((angle - span / 2.0) % 360.0);
047//        this.endAngle = Math.abs((angle + span / 2.0) % 360.0);
048        this.span = span;
049        this.radiusType = radiusType;
050    }
051    public ConeAOE(Coord origin, int radius, double angle, double span, Radius radiusType)
052    {
053        fov = new FOV(FOV.RIPPLE_LOOSE);
054        this.origin = origin;
055        this.radius = radius;
056//        this.startAngle = Math.abs((angle - span / 2.0) % 360.0);
057//        this.endAngle = Math.abs((angle + span / 2.0) % 360.0);
058        this.angle = angle;
059        this.span = span;
060        this.radiusType = radiusType;
061    }
062
063    @Override
064    public Coord getOrigin() {
065        return origin;
066    }
067
068    @Override
069    public void setOrigin(Coord origin) {
070        this.origin = origin;
071    }
072
073    @Override
074    public AimLimit getLimitType() {
075        return reach.limit;
076    }
077
078    @Override
079    public int getMinRange() {
080        return reach.minDistance;
081    }
082
083    @Override
084    public int getMaxRange() {
085        return reach.maxDistance;
086    }
087
088    @Override
089    public Radius getMetric() {
090        return reach.metric;
091    }
092
093    /**
094     * Gets the same values returned by getLimitType(), getMinRange(), getMaxRange(), and getMetric() bundled into one
095     * Reach object.
096     *
097     * @return a non-null Reach object.
098     */
099    @Override
100    public Reach getReach() {
101        return reach;
102    }
103
104    @Override
105    public void setLimitType(AimLimit limitType) {
106        reach.limit = limitType;
107
108    }
109
110    @Override
111    public void setMinRange(int minRange) {
112        reach.minDistance = minRange;
113    }
114
115    @Override
116    public void setMaxRange(int maxRange) {
117        reach.maxDistance = maxRange;
118
119    }
120
121    @Override
122    public void setMetric(Radius metric) {
123        reach.metric = metric;
124    }
125
126    /**
127     * Sets the same values as setLimitType(), setMinRange(), setMaxRange(), and setMetric() using one Reach object.
128     *
129     * @param reach a non-null Reach object.
130     */
131    @Override
132    public void setReach(Reach reach) {
133        if(reach != null)
134            this.reach = reach;
135    }
136
137    public double getRadius() {
138        return radius;
139    }
140
141    public void setRadius(double radius) {
142        this.radius = radius;
143    }
144
145    public double getAngle() {
146        return angle;
147    }
148
149    public void setAngle(double angle) {
150        if (reach.limit == null || reach.limit == AimLimit.FREE ||
151                (reach.limit == AimLimit.EIGHT_WAY && (int) angle % 45 == 0) ||
152                (reach.limit == AimLimit.DIAGONAL && (int) angle % 90 == 45) ||
153                (reach.limit == AimLimit.ORTHOGONAL && (int) angle % 90 == 0)) {
154            this.angle = angle;
155//            this.startAngle = Math.abs((angle - span / 2.0) % 360.0);
156//            this.endAngle = Math.abs((angle + span / 2.0) % 360.0);
157        }
158    }
159
160    public void setEndCenter(Coord endCenter) {
161//        radius = radiusType.radius(origin.x, origin.y, endCenter.x, endCenter.y);
162        if (AreaUtils.verifyLimit(reach.limit, origin, endCenter)) {
163            angle = NumberTools.atan2_(endCenter.y - origin.y, endCenter.x - origin.x) * 360.0;
164//            startAngle = Math.abs((angle - span / 2.0) % 360.0);
165//            endAngle = Math.abs((angle + span / 2.0) % 360.0);
166        }
167    }
168
169    public double getSpan() {
170        return span;
171    }
172
173    public void setSpan(double span) {
174        this.span = span;
175//        this.startAngle = Math.abs((angle - span / 2.0) % 360.0);
176//        this.endAngle = Math.abs((angle + span / 2.0) % 360.0);
177    }
178
179    public Radius getRadiusType() {
180        return radiusType;
181    }
182
183    public void setRadiusType(Radius radiusType) {
184        this.radiusType = radiusType;
185    }
186
187    @Override
188    public void shift(Coord aim) {
189        setEndCenter(aim);
190    }
191
192    @Override
193    public boolean mayContainTarget(Collection<Coord> targets) {
194        for (Coord p : targets) {
195            if (radiusType.radius(origin.x, origin.y, p.x, p.y) <= radius) {
196                double d = (angle - NumberTools.atan2_(p.y - origin.y, p.x - origin.x) * 360.0);
197                if(d > 180)
198                    d = 360 - d;
199                if(d < span * 0.5)
200                    return true;
201            }
202        }
203        return false;
204    }
205
206    @Override
207    public OrderedMap<Coord, ArrayList<Coord>> idealLocations(Collection<Coord> targets, Collection<Coord> requiredExclusions) {
208        if(targets == null)
209            return new OrderedMap<>();
210        if(requiredExclusions == null) requiredExclusions = new OrderedSet<>();
211
212        //requiredExclusions.remove(origin);
213        int totalTargets = targets.size();
214        OrderedMap<Coord, ArrayList<Coord>> bestPoints = new OrderedMap<>(totalTargets * 8);
215
216        if(totalTargets == 0)
217            return bestPoints;
218
219        Coord[] ts = targets.toArray(new Coord[targets.size()]);
220        Coord[] exs = requiredExclusions.toArray(new Coord[requiredExclusions.size()]);
221        Coord t;
222
223        double[][][] compositeMap = new double[totalTargets][dungeon.length][dungeon[0].length];
224        double tAngle; //, tStartAngle, tEndAngle;
225
226
227        char[][] dungeonCopy = new char[dungeon.length][dungeon[0].length];
228        double[][] tmpfov = new double[dungeon.length][dungeon[0].length];
229        Coord tempPt;
230
231        for (int i = 0; i < exs.length; i++) {
232            t = exs[i];
233//            tRadius = radiusType.radius(origin.x, origin.y, t.x, t.y);
234            tAngle = NumberTools.atan2_(t.y - origin.y, t.x - origin.x) * 360.0;
235//            tStartAngle = Math.abs((tAngle - span / 2.0) % 360.0);
236//            tEndAngle = Math.abs((tAngle + span / 2.0) % 360.0);
237            tmpfov = fov.calculateFOV(map, origin.x, origin.y, radius, radiusType, tAngle, span);
238            for (int x = 0; x < dungeon.length; x++) {
239                for (int y = 0; y < dungeon[x].length; y++) {
240                    tempPt = Coord.get(x, y);
241                    dungeonCopy[x][y] = !(origin.x == x && origin.y == y) && (tmpfov[x][y] > 0.0 || !AreaUtils.verifyLimit(reach.limit, origin, tempPt)) ? '!' : dungeon[x][y];
242                }
243            }
244        }
245        
246        Measurement dmm = Measurement.MANHATTAN;
247        if(radiusType == Radius.SQUARE || radiusType == Radius.CUBE) dmm = Measurement.CHEBYSHEV;
248        else if(radiusType == Radius.CIRCLE || radiusType == Radius.SPHERE) dmm = Measurement.EUCLIDEAN;
249        DijkstraMap dm = new DijkstraMap(dungeon, dmm);
250        for (int i = 0; i < ts.length; ++i) {
251            dm.initialize(dungeon);
252            t = ts[i];
253//            tRadius = radiusType.radius(origin.x, origin.y, t.x, t.y);
254            tAngle = NumberTools.atan2_(t.y - origin.y, t.x - origin.x) * 360.0;
255//            tStartAngle = Math.abs((tAngle - span / 2.0) % 360.0);
256//            tEndAngle = Math.abs((tAngle + span / 2.0) % 360.0);
257
258            tmpfov = fov.calculateFOV(map, origin.x, origin.y, radius, radiusType, tAngle, span);
259
260
261            for (int x = 0; x < dungeon.length; x++) {
262                for (int y = 0; y < dungeon[x].length; y++) {
263                    if (tmpfov[x][y] > 0.0)
264                    {
265                        compositeMap[i][x][y] = dm.physicalMap[x][y];
266                    }
267                    else compositeMap[i][x][y] = DijkstraMap.WALL;
268                }
269            }
270            if(compositeMap[i][t.x][t.y] > DijkstraMap.FLOOR)
271            {
272                for (int x = 0; x < dungeon.length; x++) {
273                    Arrays.fill(compositeMap[i][x], 99999.0);
274                }
275                continue;
276            }
277
278
279            dm.initialize(compositeMap[i]);
280            dm.setGoal(t);
281            dm.scan(null, null, true);
282            for (int x = 0; x < dungeon.length; x++) { 
283                for (int y = 0; y < dungeon[0].length; y++) { 
284                    if(dm.gradientMap[x][y] < DijkstraMap.FLOOR && dungeonCopy[x][y] != '!')
285                        compositeMap[i][x][y] = dm.gradientMap[x][y];
286                    else
287                        compositeMap[i][x][y] = 99999.0;
288                }
289            }
290        }
291        double bestQuality = 99999 * ts.length;
292        double[][] qualityMap = new double[dungeon.length][dungeon[0].length];
293        for (int x = 0; x < qualityMap.length; x++) {
294            for (int y = 0; y < qualityMap[x].length; y++) {
295                qualityMap[x][y] = 0.0;
296                long bits = 0;
297                for (int i = 0; i < ts.length; ++i) {
298                    qualityMap[x][y] += compositeMap[i][x][y];
299                    if(compositeMap[i][x][y] < 99999.0 && i < 63)
300                        bits |= 1 << i;
301                }
302                if(qualityMap[x][y] < bestQuality)
303                {
304                    ArrayList<Coord> ap = new ArrayList<>();
305
306                    for (int i = 0; i < ts.length && i < 63; ++i) {
307                        if((bits & (1 << i)) != 0)
308                            ap.add(ts[i]);
309                    }
310                    if(ap.size() > 0) {
311                        bestQuality = qualityMap[x][y];
312                        bestPoints.clear();
313                        bestPoints.put(Coord.get(x, y), ap);
314                    }
315                }
316                else if(qualityMap[x][y] == bestQuality) {
317                    ArrayList<Coord> ap = new ArrayList<>();
318
319                    for (int i = 0; i < ts.length && i < 63; ++i) {
320                        if ((bits & (1 << i)) != 0)
321                            ap.add(ts[i]);
322                    }
323                    if (ap.size() > 0) {
324                        bestPoints.put(Coord.get(x, y), ap);
325                    }
326                }
327
328            }
329        }
330
331        return bestPoints;
332    }
333
334    @Override
335    public OrderedMap<Coord, ArrayList<Coord>> idealLocations(Collection<Coord> priorityTargets, Collection<Coord> lesserTargets, Collection<Coord> requiredExclusions) {
336        if(priorityTargets == null)
337            return idealLocations(lesserTargets, requiredExclusions);
338        if(requiredExclusions == null) requiredExclusions = new OrderedSet<>();
339
340        //requiredExclusions.remove(origin);
341        int totalTargets = priorityTargets.size() + lesserTargets.size();
342        OrderedMap<Coord, ArrayList<Coord>> bestPoints = new OrderedMap<>(totalTargets * 8);
343
344        if(totalTargets == 0)
345            return bestPoints;
346
347        Coord[] pts = priorityTargets.toArray(new Coord[priorityTargets.size()]);
348        Coord[] lts = lesserTargets.toArray(new Coord[lesserTargets.size()]);
349        Coord[] exs = requiredExclusions.toArray(new Coord[requiredExclusions.size()]);
350        Coord t;
351
352        double[][][] compositeMap = new double[totalTargets][dungeon.length][dungeon[0].length];
353        double tAngle; //, tStartAngle, tEndAngle;
354
355        char[][] dungeonCopy = new char[dungeon.length][dungeon[0].length],
356                dungeonPriorities = new char[dungeon.length][dungeon[0].length];
357        for (int i = 0; i < dungeon.length; i++) {
358            System.arraycopy(dungeon[i], 0, dungeonCopy[i], 0, dungeon[i].length);
359            Arrays.fill(dungeonPriorities[i], '#');
360        }
361        double[][] tmpfov;
362        Coord tempPt = Coord.get(0, 0);
363        for (int i = 0; i < exs.length; ++i) {
364            t = exs[i];
365
366
367            tAngle = NumberTools.atan2_(t.y - origin.y, t.x - origin.x) * 360.0;
368            //            tStartAngle = Math.abs((tAngle - span / 2.0) % 360.0);
369//            tEndAngle = Math.abs((tAngle + span / 2.0) % 360.0);
370            tmpfov = fov.calculateFOV(map, origin.x, origin.y, radius, radiusType, tAngle, span);
371            for (int x = 0; x < dungeon.length; x++) {
372                for (int y = 0; y < dungeon[x].length; y++) {
373                    tempPt = Coord.get(x, y);
374                    dungeonCopy[x][y] = (tmpfov[x][y] > 0.0 || !AreaUtils.verifyLimit(reach.limit, origin, tempPt)) ? '!' : dungeonCopy[x][y];
375                }
376            }
377        }
378
379        t = pts[0];
380
381        Measurement dmm = Measurement.MANHATTAN;
382        if(radiusType == Radius.SQUARE || radiusType == Radius.CUBE) dmm = Measurement.CHEBYSHEV;
383        else if(radiusType == Radius.CIRCLE || radiusType == Radius.SPHERE) dmm = Measurement.EUCLIDEAN;
384
385        for (int i = 0; i < pts.length; ++i) {
386            DijkstraMap dm = new DijkstraMap(dungeon, dmm);
387            t = pts[i];
388            tAngle = NumberTools.atan2_(t.y - origin.y, t.x - origin.x) * 360.0;
389//            tStartAngle = Math.abs((tAngle - span / 2.0) % 360.0);
390//            tEndAngle = Math.abs((tAngle + span / 2.0) % 360.0);
391
392            tmpfov = fov.calculateFOV(map, origin.x, origin.y, radius, radiusType, tAngle, span);
393
394            for (int x = 0; x < dungeon.length; x++) {
395                for (int y = 0; y < dungeon[x].length; y++) {
396                    if (tmpfov[x][y] > 0.0){
397                        compositeMap[i][x][y] = dm.physicalMap[x][y];
398                        dungeonPriorities[x][y] = dungeon[x][y];
399                    }
400                    else compositeMap[i][x][y] = DijkstraMap.WALL;
401                }
402            }
403            if(compositeMap[i][pts[i].x][pts[i].y] > DijkstraMap.FLOOR)
404            {
405                for (int x = 0; x < dungeon.length; x++) {
406                    Arrays.fill(compositeMap[i][x], 399999.0);
407                }
408                continue;
409            }
410
411
412
413            dm.initialize(compositeMap[i]);
414            dm.setGoal(t);
415            dm.scan(null, null, true);
416            for (int x = 0; x < dungeon.length; x++) {
417                for (int y = 0; y < dungeon[x].length; y++) {
418                    compositeMap[i][x][y] = (dm.gradientMap[x][y] < DijkstraMap.FLOOR  && dungeonCopy[x][y] != '!') ? dm.gradientMap[x][y] : 399999.0;
419                }
420            }
421        }
422
423        t = lts[0];
424
425        for (int i = pts.length; i < totalTargets; ++i) {
426            DijkstraMap dm = new DijkstraMap(dungeon, dmm);
427            t = lts[i - pts.length];
428
429            tAngle = NumberTools.atan2_(t.y - origin.y, t.x - origin.x) * 360.0;
430            //            tStartAngle = Math.abs((tAngle - span / 2.0) % 360.0);
431//            tEndAngle = Math.abs((tAngle + span / 2.0) % 360.0);
432
433            tmpfov = fov.calculateFOV(map, origin.x, origin.y, radius, radiusType, tAngle, span);
434
435            for (int x = 0; x < dungeon.length; x++) {
436                for (int y = 0; y < dungeon[x].length; y++) {
437                    if (tmpfov[x][y] > 0.0){
438                        compositeMap[i][x][y] = dm.physicalMap[x][y];
439                    }
440                    else compositeMap[i][x][y] = DijkstraMap.WALL;
441                }
442            }
443            if(compositeMap[i][lts[i - pts.length].x][lts[i - pts.length].y] > DijkstraMap.FLOOR)
444            {
445                for (int x = 0; x < dungeon.length; x++)
446                {
447                    Arrays.fill(compositeMap[i][x], 99999.0);
448                }
449                continue;
450            }
451
452
453            dm.initialize(compositeMap[i]);
454            dm.setGoal(t);
455            dm.scan(null, null, true);
456            for (int x = 0; x < dungeon.length; x++) {
457                for (int y = 0; y < dungeon[x].length; y++) {
458                    compositeMap[i][x][y] = (dm.gradientMap[x][y] < DijkstraMap.FLOOR && dungeonCopy[x][y] != '!' && dungeonPriorities[x][y] != '#') ? dm.gradientMap[x][y] : 99999.0;
459                }
460            }
461        }
462        double bestQuality = 99999 * lts.length + 399999 * pts.length;
463        double[][] qualityMap = new double[dungeon.length][dungeon[0].length];
464        for (int x = 0; x < qualityMap.length; x++) {
465            for (int y = 0; y < qualityMap[x].length; y++) {
466                qualityMap[x][y] = 0.0;
467                long pbits = 0, lbits = 0;
468                for (int i = 0; i < pts.length; ++i) {
469                    qualityMap[x][y] += compositeMap[i][x][y];
470                    if(compositeMap[i][x][y] < 399999.0 && i < 63)
471                        pbits |= 1 << i;
472                }
473                for (int i = pts.length; i < totalTargets; ++i) {
474                    qualityMap[x][y] += compositeMap[i][x][y];
475                    if(compositeMap[i][x][y] < 99999.0 && i < 63)
476                        lbits |= 1 << i;
477                }
478                if(qualityMap[x][y] < bestQuality)
479                {
480                    ArrayList<Coord> ap = new ArrayList<>();
481
482                    for (int i = 0; i < pts.length && i < 63; ++i) {
483                        if((pbits & (1 << i)) != 0)
484                            ap.add(pts[i]);
485                    }
486                    for (int i = pts.length; i < totalTargets && i < 63; ++i) {
487                        if((lbits & (1 << i)) != 0)
488                            ap.add(lts[i - pts.length]);
489                    }
490
491                    if(ap.size() > 0) {
492                        bestQuality = qualityMap[x][y];
493                        bestPoints.clear();
494                        bestPoints.put(Coord.get(x, y), ap);
495                    }
496
497                }
498                else if(qualityMap[x][y] == bestQuality) {
499                    ArrayList<Coord> ap = new ArrayList<>();
500
501                    for (int i = 0; i < pts.length && i < 63; ++i) {
502                        if ((pbits & (1 << i)) != 0) {
503                            ap.add(pts[i]);
504                            ap.add(pts[i]);
505                            ap.add(pts[i]);
506                            ap.add(pts[i]);
507                        }
508                    }
509                    for (int i = pts.length; i < totalTargets && i < 63; ++i) {
510                        if ((lbits & (1 << i)) != 0)
511                            ap.add(lts[i - pts.length]);
512                    }
513                    if (ap.size() > 0) {
514                        bestPoints.put(Coord.get(x, y), ap);
515                    }
516                }
517            }
518        }
519
520        return bestPoints;
521    }
522
523    /*
524    @Override
525    public ArrayList<ArrayList<Coord>> idealLocations(Set<Coord> targets, Set<Coord> requiredExclusions) {
526        int totalTargets = targets.size() + 1;
527        int maxEffect = (int)(radiusType.volume2D(radius) * Math.max(5, span) / 360.0);
528        double allowed = Math.toRadians(span / 2.0);
529        ArrayList<ArrayList<Coord>> locs = new ArrayList<ArrayList<Coord>>(totalTargets);
530
531        for(int i = 0; i < totalTargets; i++)
532        {
533            locs.add(new ArrayList<Coord>(maxEffect));
534        }
535        if(totalTargets == 1)
536            return locs;
537
538        int ctr = 0;
539        if(radius < 1)
540        {
541            locs.get(totalTargets - 2).addAll(targets);
542            return locs;
543        }
544
545        double tmpAngle, ang;
546        boolean[][] tested = new boolean[dungeon.length][dungeon[0].length];
547        for (int x = 1; x < dungeon.length - 1; x += radius) {
548            BY_POINT:
549            for (int y = 1; y < dungeon[x].length - 1; y += radius) {
550                ang = Math.atan2(y - origin.y, x - origin.x); // between -pi and pi
551
552                for(Coord ex : requiredExclusions) {
553                    if (radiusType.radius(x, y, ex.x, ex.y) <= radius) {
554                        tmpAngle = Math.abs(ang - Math.atan2(ex.y - origin.y, ex.x - origin.x));
555                        if(tmpAngle > Math.PI) tmpAngle = PI2 - tmpAngle;
556                        if(tmpAngle < allowed)
557                            continue BY_POINT;
558                    }
559                }
560                ctr = 0;
561                for(Coord tgt : targets) {
562                    if (radiusType.radius(x, y, tgt.x, tgt.y) <= radius) {
563                        tmpAngle = Math.abs(ang - Math.atan2(tgt.y - origin.y, tgt.x - origin.x));
564                        if(tmpAngle > Math.PI) tmpAngle = PI2 - tmpAngle;
565                        if(tmpAngle < allowed)
566                            ctr++;
567                    }
568                }
569                if(ctr > 0)
570                    locs.get(totalTargets - ctr).add(Coord.get(x, y));
571            }
572        }
573        Coord it;
574        for(int t = 0; t < totalTargets - 1; t++)
575        {
576            if(locs.get(t).size() > 0) {
577                int numPoints = locs.get(t).size();
578                for (int i = 0; i < numPoints; i++) {
579                    it = locs.get(t).get(i);
580                    for (int x = Math.max(1, it.x - (int)(radius) / 2); x < it.x + (radius + 1) / 2 && x < dungeon.length - 1; x++) {
581                        BY_POINT:
582                        for (int y = Math.max(1, it.y - (int)(radius) / 2); y <= it.y + (radius - 1) / 2 && y < dungeon[0].length - 1; y++)
583                        {
584                            if(tested[x][y])
585                                continue;
586                            tested[x][y] = true;
587                            ang = Math.atan2(y - origin.y, x - origin.x); // between -pi and pi
588                            for(Coord ex : requiredExclusions) {
589                                if (radiusType.radius(x, y, ex.x, ex.y) <= radius) {
590                                    tmpAngle = Math.abs(ang - Math.atan2(ex.y - origin.y, ex.x - origin.x));
591                                    if(tmpAngle > Math.PI) tmpAngle = PI2 - tmpAngle;
592                                    if(tmpAngle < allowed)
593                                        continue BY_POINT;
594                                }
595                            }
596
597                            ctr = 0;
598                            for(Coord tgt : targets) {
599                                if (radiusType.radius(x, y, tgt.x, tgt.y) <= radius) {
600                                    tmpAngle = Math.abs(ang - Math.atan2(tgt.y - origin.y, tgt.x - origin.x));
601                                    if(tmpAngle > Math.PI) tmpAngle = PI2 - tmpAngle;
602                                    if(tmpAngle < allowed)
603                                        ctr++;
604                                }
605                            }
606                            if(ctr > 0)
607                                locs.get(totalTargets - ctr).add(Coord.get(x, y));
608                        }
609                    }
610                }
611            }
612        }
613        return locs;
614    }
615*/
616    @Override
617    public void setMap(char[][] map) {
618        this.map = DungeonUtility.generateResistances(map);
619        dungeon = map;
620    }
621
622    @Override
623    public OrderedMap<Coord, Double> findArea() {
624        OrderedMap<Coord, Double> r = AreaUtils.arrayToHashMap(fov.calculateFOV(map, origin.x, origin.y, radius,
625                radiusType, angle, span));
626        r.remove(origin);
627        return r;
628    }
